title: Books & Blooms Community Garden
short: Help us turn a vacant lot next to the library into a community garden—complete with outdoor reading nooks and a seed-swap kiosk.
description: We’re combining nature and literature! With your support we’ll: Build raised beds and benches. Install weather-proof shelves stocked with donated titles. Host bi-weekly garden storytimes and seed swaps. All funds go toward materials, plants, and a part-time garden coordinator. Let’s grow community, one book at a time! test
